name: Your Guide
description:
Pitch :

The world is devastated by a strange curse. Protect the receptacle containing your enemies' souls and guide it to the sanctuary, to offer them eternal rest.

Your Guide is a Student game made by 6 students of Lisaa Bordeaux during their last year.

Gameplay :

In Your Guide, you play as a monk with a huge hat.

A small receptacle is following you. It will be targeted by enemy attacks. If it dies, you'll die too.

Fight enemies to fill your adrenaline bar, and use it to heal your receptacle. When you enter a fight zone, you'll have to defeat all of the enemies before being able to move on.
